department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

remark.ch: 研究所領域分類:化工類

goal.en: "It is of fundamental interest and importance to study semiconductor-electrolyte interface in the photoelectrochemical system. This course will establish the relation between solid-state physics (electrode) and electrochemistry (electrolyte), for the students to understand the electrochemical reaction and charge transfer at the interface."
goal.ch: 半導體-電解質間的界面現象，不僅在基礎研究上具有重要性，在應用上也佔有一定的地位。本門課程希望能連結固態物理的概念(半導體)和電化學的知識(電解質)，讓學生通盤了解在界面上發生的電化學反應與電子轉移，進而深入探討不同元件在照光環境下做動的原理。

content.en:
"1. Introduction
2. Electron Energy Levels in Semiconductors and Energy Band Model
3. The Semiconductor-Electrolyte Interface at Equilibrium
4. Charge Transfer Processes in the Dark
5. Light Absorption by the Semiconductor Electrode and Carrier Collection
6. Multielectron photoprocesses
7. Nanocrystalline Semiconductor Films and Size Quantization
8. Chemically Modified Semiconductor-Electrolyte Interfaces
9. Types of Photoelectrochemical Devices"
